com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.template

Class TemplateWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.AbstractSearchReplaceWriter
        • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.template.TemplateWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable

    public class TemplateWriter
extends AbstractSearchReplaceWriter
    TemplateWriter extends SearchReplaceWriter to defer rendering of WComponents when using a template.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Jonathan Austin

    • Constructor Detail

      • TemplateWriter

        public TemplateWriter(Writer backing,
              Map<String,WComponent> componentsByKey,
              UIContext uic)
        Creates a TemplateWriter/.
        Parameters:
        backing - the underlying writer where output will be sent to.
        componentsByKey - a map of WComponents, keyed by a marker that will be output by the template.
        uic - the user's UIContext that will be used when painting the components.

    • Method Detail

      • doReplace

        protected void doReplace(String search,
             Writer backing)
        Replaces the search string by rendering the corresponding component.
        Specified by:
        doReplace in class AbstractSearchReplaceWriter
        Parameters:
        search - the search String that was matched.
        backing - the underlying writer to write the replacement to.

      • closeBackingOnClose

        protected boolean closeBackingOnClose()
        Description copied from class: AbstractSearchReplaceWriter
        Indicates whether the backing writer should be closed on close of this writer. Subclasses can override this to keep the underlying writer open.
        Overrides:
        closeBackingOnClose in class AbstractSearchReplaceWriter
        Returns:
        false - the backing should not be closed.
